channel.title: Evolutionary conflict on Luke Holman
channel.description: Recent content in Evolutionary conflict on Luke Holman

item.title: Sexual selection improves population fitness: a systematic review and meta-analysis
item.description: We synthesised 459 effect sizes from 65 pertinent experimental evolution studies using meta-analysis, and found that sexual selection on males tends to elevate the mean and reduce the variance for many fitness traits. The beneficial effect was stronger in female traits than males, and for populations evolving under stressful conditions. The results have implications for conservation and captive breeding programs.
